basics.name: Healthcare Consultant
basics.label: Consultant
basics.summary: Executive health/longevity expert and corporate wellness consultant with experience in assisting physicians, hospitals and other healthcare providers to achieve their strategic and operational goals.

work.name: Last Company Name
work.summary: Specializes in assisting physicians, hospitals, outpatient rehabilitation clinics, and a diverse list of other healthcare providers throughout the U.S. and abroad to achieve their strategic and operational goals.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for overall strategy and implementation of all aspects of the business. Company provides consulting and training seminars in the areas of executive health, corporate wellness, nutrition, stress management/work-life balance, fitness, and longevity.
highlights: Publishing in the areas of nutrition, fitness, wellness, sports, and spiritual development.

courses: And evaluating programs and protocols designed to address a wide spectrum of health issues
